description:
Gao learns that he can possess humans in his current ghost-like form. When Shido grows jealous of Kanata and Gaito`s popularity and concocts a plan, only Gao and his friends can stop him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gao in Tasuku! A Two-in-One X Tempest Buster!
Kibaou in Tasuku! Futari de Hitori no x Ten Buster!!
牙王 inタスク! 二人で一人の×天バスター!!
